actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide rules for Federal estate taxation more equitable than those presently in effect.

summary.text: Allows a general estate tax credit of $30,000 under the Internal Revenue Code. Requires the filing of a Federal estate tax return where the value of the gross estate exceeds $131,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide rules for Federal estate taxation more equitable than those presently in effect.
